subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Andy Roddick’s devastating serve — he won 89 percent of his first-serve points — and wicked forehand put away a match that might have troubled him in recent years.
snippet: Andy Roddick’s devastating serve — he won 89 percent of his first-serve points — and wicked forehand put away a match that might have troubled him in recent years.
